title: BRIEF-Duni Unit Acquires Horizons Supply In Australia
text:
BRIEF-Duni Unit Acquires Horizons Supply In Australia

Stock Markets 48 minutes ago (Oct 02, 2019 01:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Duni Unit Acquires Horizons Supply In Australia Oct 1 (Reuters) - Duni AB : * COMPLEMENTARY ACQUISITION IN CUSTOMIZED SUSTAINABLE PACKAGING SOLUTIONS IN AUSTRALIA * SUBSIDIARY BIOPAK PTY LTD ACQUIRES 100% OF HORIZONS SUPPLY PTY LTD FROM ENTREPRENEURS ANDREW BURGESS AND DOV BRENER * PURCHASE PRICE IS APPROXIMATELY SEK 40 M FOR 100% OF COMPANY AND IS COVERED WITHIN EXISTING LOAN FACILITIES * 80% OF PURCHASE PRICE WILL BE PAID ON ACQUISITION DATE AND 20% WILL BE PAID AS AN ADDITIONAL PAYMENT ON OCTOBER 1 2020 * ACQUISITION WILL BE REPORTED WITHIN BUSINESS AREA NEW MARKETS IN DUNI AS FROM OCTOBER 1 2019 * HORIZONS' ANNUAL TURNOVER IS APPROXIMATELY SEK 60 M WITH AN OPERATING MARGIN IN LINE WITH DUNI'S FINANCIAL TARGETS * HORIZONS EMPLOYS SIX EMPLOYEES AND HAS ITS OFFICE IN MELBOURNE

BRIEF-Duni Unit Acquires Horizons Supply In Australia
description: BRIEF-Duni Unit Acquires Horizons Supply In Australia
